panels.description: Percentage of statements that are prepared vs unprepared.
panels.title: Prepared Statements Ratio

targets.expr: sum by (cluster, path, threadpools) (cassandra_threadpools_activetasks{datacenter="$datacenter", cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$instance"})
sum by (cluster, path, threadpools) (irate(cassandra_threadpools_completedtasks{datacenter="$datacenter", cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$instance"}[3m]))
sum by (cluster, path, threadpools) (cassandra_threadpools_pendingtasks{datacenter="$datacenter", cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$instance"})
sum by (cluster, path, threadpools) (irate(cassandra_threadpools_totalblockedtasks_count{datacenter="$datacenter", cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$instance"}[3m]))
sum by (cluster, clientrequest) (irate(cassandra_clientrequest_latency_seconds_count{datacenter="$datacenter", cluster="$cluster", clientrequest!~"Read|.*Write.*", instance=~"$instance"}[3m]))
max by (cluster) (cassandra_clientrequest_latency_seconds{datacenter="$datacenter", cluster="$cluster", quantile="0.99", clientrequest=~".*Read.*", instance=~"$instance"})
max by (cluster) (cassandra_clientrequest_latency_seconds{datacenter="$datacenter", cluster="$cluster", quantile="0.95", clientrequest=~".*Read.*", instance=~"$instance"})
max by (cluster) (cassandra_clientrequest_latency_seconds{datacenter="$datacenter", cluster="$cluster", quantile="0.75", clientrequest=~".*Read.*", instance=~"$instance"})
max by (cluster) (cassandra_clientrequest_latency_seconds{datacenter="$datacenter", cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$instance", quantile="0.99", clientrequest=~".*Write.*"})
max by (cluster) (cassandra_clientrequest_latency_seconds{datacenter="$datacenter", cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$instance", quantile="0.95", clientrequest=~".*Write.*"})
max by (cluster) (cassandra_clientrequest_latency_seconds{datacenter="$datacenter", cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$instance", quantile="0.75", clientrequest=~".*Write.*"})
topk(5, sum by (table) (irate(cassandra_table_readlatency_seconds_count{cluster="$cluster", datacenter="$datacenter", keyspace="$keyspace", table=~"$table", instance=~"$instance"}[3m])))
topk(5, sum by (table) (irate(cassandra_table_writelatency_seconds_count{datacenter="$datacenter", cluster="$cluster", keyspace="$keyspace", table=~"$table", instance=~"$instance"}[3m])))
topk(5, max by (table) (cassandra_table_readlatency_seconds{datacenter="$datacenter", cluster="$cluster", keyspace="$keyspace", table=~"$table", instance=~"$instance", quantile="0.95"}))
topk(5, max by (table) (cassandra_table_writelatency_seconds{datacenter="$datacenter", cluster="$cluster", keyspace="$keyspace", table=~"$table", quantile="0.95"}))
topk(5, max by (table) (cassandra_table_readlatency_seconds{datacenter="$datacenter", cluster="$cluster", keyspace="$keyspace", table=~"$table", instance=~"$instance", quantile="0.99"}))
topk(5, max by (table) (cassandra_table_writelatency_seconds{datacenter="$datacenter", cluster="$cluster", keyspace="$keyspace", table=~"$table", instance=~"$instance", quantile="0.99"}))
topk(5, max by (table) (cassandra_table_coordinatorreadlatency_seconds{datacenter="$datacenter", cluster="$cluster", keyspace="$keyspace", table=~"$table", quantile="0.99"}))
topk(5, max by (table) (cassandra_table_coordinatorscanlatency_seconds{datacenter="$datacenter", cluster="$cluster", keyspace="$keyspace", table=~"$table", quantile="0.99"}))
topk(5, sum by (cluster, table) (irate(cassandra_table_droppedmutations_count{datacenter="$datacenter", cluster="$cluster", keyspace="$keyspace", table=~"$table"}[3m])))
topk(5, sum by (table) (irate(cassandra_table_compactionbyteswritten_count{datacenter="$datacenter", cluster="$cluster", keyspace="$keyspace", table=~"$table", instance=~"$instance"}[3m])))
topk(5, sum by (table) (cassandra_table_tombstonescannedhistogram{datacenter="$datacenter", cluster="$cluster", keyspace="$keyspace", table=~"$table", quantile="0.99"}))
topk(5, max by (table) (cassandra_table_maxpartitionsize{datacenter="$datacenter", cluster="$cluster", keyspace="$keyspace", table=~"$table"}))/1024/1024
topk(10, sum by (table) (cassandra_table_totaldiskspaceused_count{datacenter="$datacenter", cluster="$cluster", keyspace="$keyspace", table=~"$table"}))
topk(10, cassandra_table_readlatency_seconds{datacenter="$datacenter", cluster="$cluster", keyspace="$keyspace", table=~"$table", instance=~"$instance", quantile="0.95"})
topk(10, cassandra_table_writelatency_seconds{datacenter="$datacenter", cluster="$cluster", keyspace="$keyspace", table=~"$table", instance=~"$instance", quantile="0.95"})
topk(10, cassandra_table_readlatency_seconds{datacenter="$datacenter", cluster="$cluster", keyspace="$keyspace", table=~"$table", quantile="0.999", instance=~"$instance"})
topk(10, cassandra_table_writelatency_seconds{datacenter="$datacenter", cluster="$cluster", keyspace="$keyspace", table=~"$table", quantile="0.999", instance=~"$instance"})
topk(10, cassandra_table_coordinatorreadlatency_seconds{datacenter="$datacenter", cluster="$cluster", keyspace="$keyspace", table=~"$table", quantile="0.999", instance=~"$instance"})
topk(10, cassandra_table_tombstonescannedhistogram{datacenter="$datacenter", cluster="$cluster", keyspace="$keyspace", table=~"$table", instance=~"$instance", quantile="0.999"})
topk(10, cassandra_table_coordinatorscanlatency_seconds{datacenter="$datacenter", cluster="$cluster", keyspace="$keyspace", table=~"$table", quantile="0.999", instance=~"$instance"})

topk(10, cassandra_table_compactionbyteswritten_count{datacenter="$datacenter", cluster="$cluster", keyspace="$keyspace", table=~"$table", instance=~"$instance"} - cassandra_table_compactionbyteswritten_count{datacenter="$datacenter", cluster="$cluster", keyspace="$keyspace", table=~"$table", instance=~"$instance"} offset 1m)

topk(10, (cassandra_table_droppedmutations_count{datacenter="$datacenter", cluster="$cluster", keyspace="$keyspace", table=~"$table", instance=~"$instance"} - cassandra_table_droppedmutations_count{datacenter="$datacenter", cluster="$cluster", keyspace="$keyspace", table=~"$table", instance=~"$instance"} offset 1m))
topk(10, sum by (instance) (cassandra_table_totaldiskspaceused_count{datacenter="$datacenter", cluster="$cluster", keyspace="$keyspace", table=~"$table", instance=~"$instance"}))
